EXTRACTED VALUE: With is short missions and cumbersome customizing options, Armored Core 4 isn't nearly as entertaining as it should be.
In short, Project Sylpheed has a solid foundation, but a lot of the game is simply unnecessary.
BlackSite is a decent game unfortunately held back by poor AI and a lack of variety amongst the poorly designed enemies.
Hot graphics, solid controls, decent fun factor, online gameplay which the first game didn't have; but a totally shallow game.
I enjoy both FEAR games in brief spurts.
Fun is the bottom line here. Arcade simple, but entertaining. A.I. is unscrupulous at times.
Aurally, WipEout 3 is a masterpiece. In fact, it's almost worth buying just so that you can listen to the music in your CD player.
This is one of the better RTSs on console[s] at the moment. but there are more on the way. [June 2008, p.78]
